price: Ikawa inakwenda kwa nadhari yetu, kuwa ni malipo kwa alivyo kuwa amekanushwa.
arabic: تَجۡرِي بِأَعۡيُنِنَا جَزَآءٗ لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
footnotes: Likawa linakwenda baharini chini ya hifadhi yetu, kuwa ni malipo kwa Nuhu ambaye watu wake waliendelea kuukanya wito wake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: tajrī bi-aʿyuninā jazāan liman kāna kufira
